tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE QualityControlDashboards (
    dashboard_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    dashboard_name TEXT,
    created_by TEXT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP,
    metrics JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE MetricsMapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_id INT,
    analyst_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (metric_id) REFERENCES QualityMetrics(metric_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (analyst_id) REFERENCES Analysts(analyst_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DashboardMetrics (
    dashboard_id INT,
    mapping_id INT,
    display_order INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (dashboard_id) REFERENCES Dashboards(dashboard_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (mapping_id) REFERENCES MetricsMapping(mapping_id)
);
